# include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string a,b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        int i,c0=0,c1=0,count1=0,count0=0;
        for(i=0;i<a.length();i++)
        {
            if(a[i]!=b[i])
            {
                if(a[i]=='0')
                {
                    c0++;
                }
                else
                {
                    c1++;
                }
            }
            if(a[i]=='0')
                count0++;
            if(a[i]=='1')
                count1++;
        }
        if(count0==a.length() || count1==a.length())
        {
            cout<<"Unlucky Chef"<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<"Lucky Chef"<<endl;
            if(c0>c1)
            {
                cout<<c0<<endl;
            }
            else
            {
                cout<<c1<<endl;
            }
        }
    }
}
